title: Create pyproject.toml with dependencies
description:
Create pyproject.toml with all required dependencies.

## Dependencies
- google-adk (check version from otb-agents)
- fastapi
- uvicorn
- httpx
- pydantic
- pydantic-settings
- python-dotenv
- google-cloud-bigquery
- opentelemetry-api
- opentelemetry-sdk
- pytest
- pytest-asyncio

## Open Question
